class.name: MathArithmeticException

javadoc.text: Base class for arithmetic exceptions. * It is used for all the exceptions that have the semantics of the standard{@link ArithmeticException}, but must also provide a localized * message.

javadoc.param: pattern Message pattern providing the specific context of * the error.

class.comment:
